subject: Baseball
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: Yogi Berra is the living embodiment of America’s most famous professional sports team, an approachable and unpretentious Hall of Famer who represents a proud franchise not always associated with such qualities.
snippet: Yogi Berra is the living embodiment of America’s most famous professional sports team, an approachable and unpretentious Hall of Famer who represents a proud franchise not always associated with such qualities.
